Blog.post: YaY I finally did something =)! So Brittany calls me after she got home from Cheerleading and asked me If I wanted to go to Dylan's house with Him and Danny so I did. Wow it was fun! Dylan and Danny cRaCk me up! We went outside in the rain after Dylan and Danny riped Brittany's shirt in half haha well she had two so she had something else on;-) so we were all like chasing each other and wrestling and hitting each other with the shirt haha sounds pretty gay but it was actually kind of fun. Well Dylan and Britt were no where in sight haha so Danny gets out this juicy thing and starts squirting me with it and stuff so I chased him and was gonnna tackle him but he's pretty fast so we both stopped cause we were tired and Danny goes look a bird so I looked being the stupid person I am and he was already running haha wow great time. Well Brittany had to be home at 11 so we left there and I walked to her house and my mom came and picked me up around 11:15ish and then I came home and watched a HALLOWEEN movie with my sister Jess which I've seen like 10 times but I was still SCARED lol Michael Meyers ewww I don't like him haha! He's very very very very scary!!!!Marr!!!! Now I am getting ready to go to bed and stuff. Tomorrow I have soccer from 6:00-8:00 so I don't know what I am going to do before that but I hope I do something. But I am going to go to bed now so I will talk to yall tomorrow morning or something GoOd NiGhT I love Yall. -FLETCHIE-

HeyHey Wow this day has been FUN haha sike! For the last like 3 nights I haven't done Anything!!!!! So today basically all I did was sleep,eat,and watch some television. Tomorrow I have Soccer--Yes sir. On Wednesday I think I might go to the movies with Julie Michael and Luke but we'll see when it comes around.Hopefully I will find something to do tonight so Im not stuck here again! Lyndsey and Emily are in Adams County with Jon and Willie having Fun:( wish I could of went haha. Lately I have been wanting to go Go Kart riding cause I haven't done that since last summer at Kings Island with Lyndsey Shane Emily Willie and Jack haha Lyndsey was too short to drive so she rode with me! Well we reck with I think Shane but we did it on purpose:) but it just sounds like something Fun to do! Well im gonna go! Buh Bye! I *LOVE* YALL -FLETCHIE-

HOWDY! I got really bored so I just decided to write in here (Again) cause Im just cool like that ...I just got done eating a twinkie it was YuMmY haha! Tonight I worked on some picture stuff..I just got ALOT of pictures back yesterday there all sooooo cute! I love my friends haha I just had to say that. I might go down in a little and shoot some pool with my brother and his friend Nate but we'll see. Have a nice day and night:)!!!!!!! I love Yall -Fletchie-

Hey Yall Well today I got up once again early 7:30 grrr and went and played some volleyball (which I don't even play) haha but thats okay I had nothing better to do. Well I just got out of the shower and stuff and today and tonight I don't have anything planned what great fun. But I just might go work on some soccer stuff who know's well see. I was going to go running tonight but I doubt that will happen. Last Night I had a big headache so I just watched movies and stuff and layed around.I watched Halloween (Scary dude) I hate Michael Meyers he's the scariest monster dude guy thing ever and I also watched some of Malibus Most Wanted (Great Movie) reminds me of a couple of kids no names haha just kidding. But Calli got home from Church Camp*Haha* and Kentucky today Yippeee :)!! Welp I am going to go eat some food and stuff I love Yall -Fletchie-

HeyHey Well today was a pretty good day. We were supposed to have soccer practice so I got up at 9:00 not so fun and then Jessie came around 9:30ish and Me Her Megan and Alycia were waiting on everyone else to come turns out only Katie Britt Dani Lauren Sally Steph and Kayla showed up also..hmm..so we decided we had practice enough throughout the week and went out to Applebees-Yess sir it was fun. On the way home Me Jessie Katie and Lauren we're all jammin to Nynsc haha great time great time. I didn't do anything tonight cause I had a headache and really didn't feel like doing anything. Tomorrow I don't really have anything planned so whatever happens we'll see. But this thing is pretty niffty.Well Im Gonna go I love Yall. *FLETCHIE*
